example: In 2003, following the release of Diorama , the band announced a hiatus, during which time members recorded with side projects The Dissociatives, The Mess Hall, and Tambalane.

definition: A three-dimensional display of a scenery, often having a painted background in front of which models are arranged, e.g. in a museum where stuffed animals are presented against a painted landscape.

example: He came back tired and exasperated .

definition: Simple past tense and past participle of exasperate.

example: Oh, please, don't be coy with me.
example_meaning: Làm ơn, đừng rụt rè với tôi.
definition: (archaic) Quiet, reserved, modest.

definition: The process of thinking or meditating on a subject

example: Heralds are crying the news now.

definition: A messenger, especially one bringing important news.

example: Is this an errant apprentice or captive?

definition: Following in time; coming or being after something else at any time, indefinitely.
